title: Jessica Biel is off-duty chic as she flashes a smile during solo coffee run in New York City
text:
She has been out in force promoting her new Facebook Watch drama series, Limetown.

And Jessica Biel enjoyed a slower morning on Tuesday as she was spotted stepping out in New York City to pick up a cup of coffee.

The 37-year-old beauty struggled to wipe the smile off her face as she strolled down the city alone without her husband Justin Timberlake.

Coffee run: Jessica Biel showcased her chic off-duty fashion on Tuesday when she was spotted stepping out for a coffee in New York City alone

Jessica kept things in a comfortable in a black hoodie underneath a denim jacket.

She teamed the look with a satin midi-length skirt and white sneakers for the morning walk.

The mom-of-one was solo and accessorised with a pair of round sunglasses and a cross-body bag.

Warm and chic: Jessica kept things in a comfortable in a black hoodie underneath a denim jacket

New role: The wife of Justin Timberlake's appearance comes as she stars in a new role for Facebook Watch's new series, Limetown; seen on October 15 in LA

Jessica pulled back her brunette hair into a top-knot and appeared to be makeup free.

The star's appearance comes as she stars in a new role for Facebook Watch's new series, Limetown.

Based on the podcast of the same name, Jessica plays a journalist Lia Haddock who investigates the disappearance of more than 300 people at a neuroscience research facility in Tennessee.

Investigative journalist: Based on the podcast of the same name, Jessica plays a journalist Lia Haddock who investigates the disappearance of more than 300 people at a neuroscience research facility in Tennessee

The drama also stars Stanley Tucci, Marlee Matlin, Kelly Jenrette, John Beasley, Louis Ferreira, Sherri Saum, Rekha Sharma and Vera Frederickson.

Jessica is also riding high in her career following her role in season one of the crime drama mystery, The Sinner, which garnered her a Golden Globe nomination for Best Actress - Miniseries Or Television Film.

The series, which debuted on the USA in August 2017, has been renewed for a third season.
description: Jessica Biel showcased her chic off-duty fashion on Tuesday when she was spotted stepping out for a coffee in New York City alone.
